This feature allows you to unlock the smart lock remotely via a gateway. This feature can ONLY be turned ON or OFF via bluetooth near the lock.
Please remove the locks first in the lock settings
Make sure your lock is within Bluetooth
Please enter the characters on the lock keyboard
Please put the IC card in the card reading area and enter the characters above on the lock keyboard. Click \"Synchronize data\" after the IC card is added. Make sure your lock is within Bluetooth.

Please note that all IC cards of this lock will be cleared after you enter the characters above on the lock keyboard. Click \"Synchronize data\" after the IC card is cleared. Make sure your lock is within Bluetooth.
Upload IC cards means reading valid IC cards from the lock and upload them to the Server. Please turn on your phone\'s Bluetooth and make sure it is near the lock.
Connected, place the card against the card reader sensor on the smart lock.
Make sure the door lock is nearby and all IC Cards will be cleared
The phone number has been used
Your account is logged in on another device, please log in again.
Place your finger on the fingerprint sensor to complete the verification.

Sync to update password status. Make sure your phone is near the lock.
Sync lock operation records. Make sure your phone is near the lock.
Sync to update lock battery. Make sure your phone is near the lock.
By turning ON lock sound, you can hear the sound of lock when operating, including reminding of pressing buttons, unlocking and locking, and wrong password.
Please touch the lock keypad to activate the lock, and make sure your phone is near the lock.
During adding the Keybox, please keep the Keybox OPEN all the time as shown in the picture.
The Keybox is open as the guide above
The lock keypad is lit up as the guide above
In the factory mode, the default password of the Keybox is 1234. To unlock the Keybox, enter 1234 on the keypad and end with # or the UNLOCK button on the bottom right.

If you want to create your own password, please select \"Customize\" type on top left. Otherwise, you can get a random password by othe types.\n\nIf you are creating a \"Customize\" password, make sure the phone Bluetooth is enabled and your phone is near the lock.
Thank you for using Populife. Please read the User Terms and Privacy Policy carefully before using it. Click Agree to continue if you agree with all the policies, or click Disagree to exit.
Notes: The # key is the UNLOCKING key at the bottom right. Please don\'t share the password with anyone.

Touch the lock keyboard, the keyboard should be on, if not, please check whether the battery is installed correctly, whether the cable is connected properly, if there is no problem, the keyboard is still not on, please contact us.
